page.title: 12Warmington Village #4
page.content:
The village has no shop but a ladies hairdresser which has become a focal point for communication and activity.
Although there is no shop, this and other local villages are well served by mobile stores with daily/weekly deliveries.e.g.Baker,Fishmonger, Milkman,Butcher,Library,Newsagent.
There is a Village Cricket team which plays regularly in local competitions. There is no local Cricket Ground but the team use a farmers field and the Village Green for practice. Matches take place at "away" venues.
